text: Carlos Humberto Ruiz Guti√©rrez (born 15 September 1979), nicknamed El Pescadito ("The Little Fish"), is a Guatemalan former professional footballer. Ruiz has played for five MLS clubs (Los Angeles Galaxy, FC Dallas, Toronto FC, Philadelphia Union, and D.C. United). He was a member of the Guatemalan national team from 1998 to 2016. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Guatemalan footballers Category:People from Guatemala City Category:Toronto FC players
title: Carlos Ruiz
